name: Interstate 420 - Free
description:
How far can you weave through dangerous interstate traffic.

Dodge dangerous traffic and avoid those crash barriers, the further you go the higher the score.

iTunes Reviews (UK):

"Easy to use and a fun game to play while passing the time"

"Very addictive."

Game Features:
• Amazing HD Retina Graphics.
• Leaderboards
• Twitter and Facebook integration.
• Supports all screen sizes

Full Game Features:
• 7 highly detailed and customisable cars.
• Night Theme
• Achievements
• No Adverts
